title: Hand of Fate (2.5.0.9) + 5 DLC (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "setup_hand_of_fate_2.4.0.8.exe"
- Run "patch_hand_of_fate_2.5.0.9.exe"
- Navigate to the DLC folder and run "setup_hand_of_fate_dlc_wildcards_2.3.0.7.exe"
- Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

DLC included:
HAND OF FATE: WILDCARDS
HAND OF FATE: DESCENT INTO THE UNDERWORLD
HAND OF FATE: THE HALL OF THE GOBLIN KING
HAND OF FATE: WHITE COUNCIL
HAND OF FATE: WINTERS HUNT
